short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn ChatGPT into a retro 80s style website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Retro 80s ChatGPT Enhancer is a script that transforms the ChatGPT interface into a nostalgic 80s-style website.  
Retro 80s Style: Transforms the ChatGPT interface with a classic black background and green text, reminiscent of early computer screens.
Dark Mode: Automatically forces dark mode for a consistent retro look.
Improved Button Hover Effects: Enhances the hover effects of buttons, making them glow and change colors for a dynamic retro feel.
Periodic Updates: Continuously applies styles to newly loaded elements for a seamless experience.
